remarks: The inverse relation is a relation between morphisms ` F : X --> Y ` and their inverses ` G : Y --> X ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
statement:
invfval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
invfval.n $e |- N = ( Inv ` C ) $.
invfval.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) $.
invfval.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
invfval.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
invss.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
invss $p |- ( ph -> ( X N Y ) C_ ( ( X H Y ) X. ( Y H X ) ) ) $.
